pkgmetadata.longdescription: Terrestrial Point Cloud Processing of Forest Data // Algorithms for tree detection, noise removal, stem modelling, 3D visualization and manipulation of terrestrial 'LiDAR' (but not only) point clouds, currently focusing on high performance applications for forest inventory - being fully compatible with the 'LAS' infrastructure provided by 'lidR'. For in depth descriptions of the stem classification and segmentation algorithms check out Conto et al. (2017) doi:10.1016/j.compag.2017.10.019.
